name: Blair the Horror Game
description:
Blair is a horror game in wich you are an explorer willing to sacrifice his life to find the secret behind Blair. However Blair doesn't want you to get away with her information. she will start making a grudge like sound when she starts to hunt. 

New Update Features:

- Minor map changes

- Crucifix: the crucifix can be used to stop blair from hunting or chasing you for 15 seconds

- Menu Bug Change
